## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] My code follows the Unix philosophy (small, focused, composable)
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have added/updated tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] I have run `scripts/validate_plugin.sh` and it passes
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, CONTRIBUTING, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added examples demonstrating the new functionality (if applicable)
